snippet.title: Double Cross Announcement Trailer - Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
Developed by 13AM Games, the studio behind award-winning Runbow, Double Cross is an adventure-game style investigation crossed with an intense action platformer. Players are also free to customize Zahra’s play style in order to become the top RIFT agent.

Learn more about Double Cross! https://goo.gl/Z51i7L

#NintendoSwitch #DoubleCross #13AMGames

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun! https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Visit Nintendo.com for all the latest! http://www.nintendo.com
